32.1.hd_quote: A life sustaining respect and attention to all aspects of a process.
32.1.behavioral_axis: Honors tested methods and slows change so the tribe survives the transition.
32.1.shadow_axis: Overprotects legacy systems and resists necessary upgrades.

32.2.hd_quote: The control of power for the benefit and enhancement of harmony.
32.2.behavioral_axis: Uses instinct to decide when to apply or withhold transformative pressure.
32.2.shadow_axis: Bottles change so long the field stagnates.

32.3.behavioral_axis: Keeps re-evaluating whether the change will actually endure.
32.3.shadow_axis: Gets stuck in indecision and loses tribal trust.

32.4.hd_quote: The instinct to maintain one's principles in times of change.
32.4.behavioral_axis: Holds the line on core values while everything shifts.
32.4.shadow_axis: Becomes dogmatic and rejects healthy innovation.

32.5.behavioral_axis: Knows what to keep and what to bend so continuity survives.
32.5.shadow_axis: Over-bends and dilutes the original successful pattern.

32.6.hd_quote: The need to calmly face impermanence.
32.6.behavioral_axis: Accepts that change is constant and continuity is an art.
32.6.shadow_axis: Detached calm looks like indifference to tribal survival risks.
